pages.text: Claiming is a feature of HexMC used to protect your items and structures. $(br2)There is different tiers of claim blocks that can protect more area as well as claim augments.

pages.title: Getting started
pages.text: This is a makeshift claim anchor, it is the starting point to protect your base. It protects a 10x10x10 radius.

pages.title: Upgrading
pages.text: The makeshift claim can be upgraded in 2 ways either through a claim upgrade kit or using it in the upgrade recipe.$(br2)The upgrade kit is used by right clicking the existing claim block.

pages.title: Claim Goggles
pages.text: $(thing)Goggles of Claim Revealing$() is an helmet that allows you to see the border of claims making it possible to know where a claim ends yours or anothers.

pages.title: Augments
pages.text: Augments are additions to existing claims that are placed next to the core. They are used to change claim permissions and buffs.
